Package Appointment

Interface AppointmentSlotService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentSlotManager
public interface AppointmentSlotService
The AppointmentSlotService interface provides methods for managing appointment slots, including updating availability, creating new slots, and viewing available slots.

This interface defines the core functionalities required for handling appointment slot-related operations.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Xing Juan Rennie

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setAppointmentAvailability(String appointmentSlotID, String availability)
    Updates the availability of an existing appointment slot based on the slot ID.
    void
    setAppointmentAvailability(String doctorID, String doctorName, String appointmentDate, String appointmentTime, String availability)
    Creates a new appointment slot for a doctor with the specified details.
    void
    viewAvailableAppointmentSlots()
    Displays all available appointment slots for patients.

  • Method Details

    • setAppointmentAvailability

      void setAppointmentAvailability(String appointmentSlotID, String availability)
      Updates the availability of an existing appointment slot based on the slot ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentSlotID - The ID of the appointment slot to update.
      availability - The new availability status (e.g., "Available", "Booked").

    • setAppointmentAvailability

      void setAppointmentAvailability(String doctorID, String doctorName, String appointmentDate, String appointmentTime, String availability)
      Creates a new appointment slot for a doctor with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment slot.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment slot.
      availability - The availability status of the slot (e.g., "Available").

    • viewAvailableAppointmentSlots

      void viewAvailableAppointmentSlots()
      Displays all available appointment slots for patients. Only slots marked as "Available" are displayed.
